queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:rus_online_cash_register_request_logs` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `request` text, `response` text, `message` varchar(255) NULL, `timestamp` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:rus_online_cash_register_receipts` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `object_type` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `object_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `status_message` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `phone` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `sno` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `items` text, `payments` text, `uuid` varchar(128) NULL, `fiscal_receipt_number` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `shift_number` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `receipt_timestamp` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `receipt_total` decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, `fn_number` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `ecr_registration_number` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `fiscal_document_number` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `fiscal_document_attribute` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `created_timestamp` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `updated_timestamp` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `currency` varchar(16) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY (`uuid`), KEY `object_idx` (`object_type`,`object_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
